name: Ninja Danger
description:
Ninja Danger is a Top down shooter game where you control a ninja who is lost in a haunted forest and has no way out. Defend yourself using the weapons that drop when you kill the zombie-ghost hybrids, minions, the ripper and flying beasts that spit their goo on you! The boss is lurking in the dark woods waiting to revile himself at any moment. Be on the look out! 

Weapons available in game include:

  • Kunai Pistol
  • Bomb Launcher
  • Slug Gun

I have a message for you:

AIM FOR THE HEAD!

Enjoy the game 😀👍

@vocastgames
